description: Norman Burg is Roger`s butler. Forty years before the commencement of the story, Norman, like the rest of Paradigm, lost all memories from before that day, but he would not think twice before going once more unto the breach for his master. Resourceful and talented, he is also caretaker of the Big O. Norman`s skills give him a purpose and a mission to accomplish for Roger.
name: Norman Burg
